sentences.english: This paper also discusses the framework of forecasting the induced passenger flow volume in URT.
sentences.chinese: 給出了城市軌道交通誘增交通量預測框架。

sentences.english: Non -stress test has a higher clinical value in foretelling perinatal prognosis ofp olyhydramnios.
sentences.chinese: 無激惹試驗在其預測圍生兒預後具有較好的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: It is shown that the potential copper resource in the East Tianshan Mountains is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 預測認爲，東天山地區銅的資源潛力巨大。

sentences.english: By recognizing the changing characteristics of your cervical mucus, you can predict when you'll ovulate.
sentences.chinese: 通過認識到宮頸粘液性狀的改變，可以預測排卵時間。

sentences.english: Forecasting the market-clearing price (MCP) is the most essential task for any decision-making in electricity market.
sentences.chinese: 市場清算電價預測是電力市場中交易決策的基礎。

sentences.english: But this is as speculative as Fenner's gloomy forecast.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這和芬納悲觀的預測一樣都是推測性的。

sentences.english: Theway of Americans often operated was somewhat predictable.
sentences.chinese: 美國人的行爲方式或多或少還是可以預測的。

sentences.english: Ukraine Gas Markets Investment Opportunities, Market Analysi…
sentences.chinese: 年烏克蘭天然氣市場分析預測研究報告。

sentences.english: Each side tries to anticipate the actions of the other.
sentences.chinese: 每一方都試圖預測另一方的行動。

sentences.english: The future detailed prices were forecasted by univariate time series models.
sentences.chinese: 用單變量時間序列模型預測未來細節電價。

sentences.english: At last, the forcasting equation of the plant output was supplied.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了農作物產量的預測預報方程。

sentences.english: The problem with technological predictions is that they are almost always solution-driven.
sentences.chinese: 技術預測的問題在於，這種預測總是受解決方法驅使。

sentences.english: The problem with technological predictions is that they are almost always solution-driven.
sentences.chinese: 技術預測的問題在於，這種預測總是受解決方法驅使。

sentences.english: Predictability is the ability of a machine to behave as expected.
sentences.chinese: 可預測性是機器按照期望的那樣來運轉的能力。

sentences.english: In Chapter four, predict the positive effects of purchasing-house-for-pension by joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，預測了推行合資購房養老的積極效應。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a recursive forecast method for elevator traffic flow based on outlier detection.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於異常值檢測的電梯交通流遞歸預測方法。

definition: to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
